examples.translation: 闲著的时候到我们这儿来坐坐。
examples.first: Come and see us if you're at a

examples.translation: 防盗警报器一响，警卫就放出了警犬。
examples.last: the dogs when the burglar alarm went off.

examples.translation: 我不敢把比尔放到花园去－－他会把花全都拔掉的。
examples.last: on the garden he'd pull up all the flowers.

adj: not compact or dense in structure or arrangement
not tight; not closely constrained or constricted or constricting
(of a ball in sport) not in the possession or control of any player
v: grant freedom to; free from confinement
turn loose or free from restraint

adj: 宽松的, 不牢固的, 不精确的
v: 释放, 放枪, 开船
n: 解放, 放任, 放纵
